body.p: John Norris was born in February of 1781 in Maryland. Enlisted in the military in May 1813 in Mason County, Kentucky. Fought in the Battle of Lake Erie, near Put-In-Bay, Ohio, as a sharp shooter under Commodore Perry during the War of 1812. He was awarded a gold medal for his service in January of 1867. After his service Norris was a farmer until his death. Norris died on January 5, 1879 in Petersburg, Boone County, Kentucky.
